column8: Enable attributes (in XML) or classes/properties (in RDF) for variant titles (uniform, translated, multiple, etc.)
We need to separate out Subject and Genre. They represent fundamentally different descriptive aspects.

Difference between contributor and creator? Should creator become name class with properties for name role types (creator, contributor, illustrator, etc.)? If so, should we consider basing our work more off MODS and less off DC?
Wish to have both machine readable and human readable dates? Will also require attributes/properties

column6: DCMI Type Vocabulary (all will be 'Text'); expand type vocabulary for zines?
column8: Compare with Genre, review need for this info.
Physical format - perhaps looking into local formats list for zines to cover unique/unususal formats for this type of resource.
would like to include multiple identifiers - ZC URI, local catalog bib id, others - again, will need attributes/properties so computers/discovery interface can separate these out
